item.title: Script CTF 2025 - Writeups
item.description: Web Renderer (100) Introducing Renderer! A free-to-use app to render your images! The challenge consists of a flask application. Three paths were defined: Upload: @app.route("/", methods=["GET", "POST"]) def upload(): if request.method == "POST": if "file" not in request.files: return redirect(request.url) file = request.files["file"] if file.filename == "": return redirect(request.url) if file and allowed(file.filename): filename = file.filename hash = sha256(os.urandom(32)).hexdigest() filepath = f'./static/uploads/{hash}.{filename.split(".")[1]}' file.save(filepath) return redirect(f'/render/{hash}.{filename.split(".")[1]}') return render_template("upload.html") Uploaded file extension is check using allowed.

item.title: CSAW CTF 2024 - Writeups
item.description: Web/Log Me In I (definitely did not) have found this challenge in the OSIRIS recruit repository author: nikobelic29 The challenge have three routes: /register -> create an account POST - username, password, displayname /login -> login to the account POST - username, password /user -> user panel that shows user information GET - Cookies[info] Our goal is to login as admin user, and for that we need to somehow set the uid value to 0 and visit /user to see the flag.

item.title: TFC CTF 2024 - Writeups
item.description: TFC CTF was fun. Though we could only solve 2 of the challenges in the web category. Here are the writeups for the two of them: Greetings This was a warmup challenge were we have to exploit an SSTI vulnerability to retrieve the flag. In the homepage there’s an input and when we enter a value it is reflected in there. SSTI To know how the server is handling input we tried to inject %0a character into the username parameter which threw an error.

item.title: About Us
item.description: We are GhostSquad a small team of like minded and enthusiastic security researchers. We often participates in CTF competitions to increase our skills and learn new and innovative ways to find and exploit vulnerabilities in various targets. CTFTime
